channel.title: Potential Auxy Tutorial/Technique series - Poll
channel.description: Hey everyone. I’ve been wanting to start doing some simple videos talking about my Auxy techniques and stuff for a while. I have some ideas with what I want to do, but I want your opinion on what you’d like to see first. I’ll (hopefully) end up hitting all of these points eventually. I have a few ideas that I didn’t put on this poll, but if you have anything you’d like to see that isn’t listed, please let me know. The poll is just to decide what I’m going to do first, so I’m sticking with the basics. Thanks everyone! Also if you have any ideas for a series name let me know! [poll type=regular public=true] * Melodies * Chords * Drums * Sound Layering * Arpeggios * Getting the Most out of Automation [/poll]

item.title: Potential Auxy Tutorial/Technique series - Poll
item.dc:creator: Goxenar
item.description:
Definitely that too, automate the volume to balance the sounds as one. Don’t overlap.

Read full topic

item.title: Potential Auxy Tutorial/Technique series - Poll
item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
Goxenar:

I second this, layer sounds please, stack them up, tower them, whatever you wanna call it but layering sounds is quite important. It creates such a great perspective of sound instead of ONE plain old. “Boop.”

It’s also the quickest way to phasing issues or a muddy mix if you don’t know what you’re doing.

Read full topic

item.title: Potential Auxy Tutorial/Technique series - Poll

item.title: Potential Auxy Tutorial/Technique series - Poll
item.dc:creator: Eswyn
item.description:
Woah. Uh… I’ll be honest - I completely forgot. Seems like a handful of people were interested though, so I’ll see what I can do. I might start working on something. I’ve also improved a lot since then, so I could definitely do a lot better now than before. Thanks for reminding me!

That’d be a great place to start.

item.title: Potential Auxy Tutorial/Technique series - Poll
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
Personally, id prefer seeing something with drums or automation b/c it’s something a bit more unique to Auxy.

I could find a million tutorials on YouTube already about chords, melodies, basses, etc. But I doubt I’d find many, if at all, tutorials about Auxy automation.

Read full topic

item.title: Potential Auxy Tutorial/Technique series - Poll
item.dc:creator: DJC
item.description:
Ooh that might be a good idea. At the end, you’ll have a final product where you used every component and turned each of them into a tutorial.

Read full topic

item.title: Potential Auxy Tutorial/Technique series - Poll
item.dc:creator: Eswyn
item.description:
Yeah I was actually thinking about that.
I’m considering possibly working on a song from scratch, and each episode I add more. However it’d also be nice to hear different songs every episode and not the same thing over and over.

Read full topic

item.title: Potential Auxy Tutorial/Technique series - Poll
item.dc:creator: DJC
item.description:
If you want to hit the more basic ideas of music production first, I would release on the lines of
Chords
Melodies
Sound Layering
Drums
Getting the Most out of automation
Arpeggios

That way your viewers will know the very basics first and then can step up to the topics where you need to know about those basics! Just a suggestion.

Read full topic
